---
id: update-user-role
title: "Update user role"
description: "The API updates the role assigned to a user. It allows you to set and change the user roles and specify additional role related configrations such as escalated alerts and cases."
sidebar_label: "Update user role"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: docs/seerportal-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update user role"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/userDetails/updateUsersRole"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The API updates the role assigned to a user. It allows you to set and change the user roles and specify additional role related configrations such as escalated alerts and cases.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<MimeTabs
  className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
>
  <TabItem
    label={"application/json"}
    value={"application/json-schema"}
  >
    <details
      style={{}}
      className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"}
      data-collapsed={false}
      open={true}
    >
      <summary
        style={{}}
        className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}
      >
        <h3
          className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}
        >
          Body
        </h3><strong
          className={"openapi-schema__required"}
        >
          required
        </strong>
      </summary><div
        style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <div
          style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}
        >
          
          
          null
          
          
        </div>
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={true}
          className={"schemaItem"}
        >
          <details
            style={{}}
            className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
          >
            <summary
              style={{}}
            >
              <span
                className={"openapi-schema__container"}
              >
                <strong
                  className={"openapi-schema__property"}
                >
                  roleData
                </strong><span
                  className={"openapi-schema__name"}
                >
                   object[]
                </span>
              </span>
            </summary><div
              style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
            >
              <div
                style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}
              >
                
                
                Array of role mapping for the user. Each object contains role_id and user_id.
                
                
              </div><li>
                <div
                  style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}
                >
                  Array [
                </div>
              </li><SchemaItem
                collapsible={false}
                name={"roleId"}
                required={false}
                schemaName={"int64"}
                qualifierMessage={undefined}
                schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int64","default":3735,"description":"The ID of role to be assigned. e.g: **3735**"}}
              >
                
              </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                collapsible={false}
                name={"userId"}
                required={false}
                schemaName={"int64"}
                qualifierMessage={undefined}
                schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int64","default":12303,"description":"The ID of user who will be assigned the role. e.g: **12303**"}}
              >
                
              </SchemaItem><li>
                <div
                  style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}
                >
                  ]
                </div>
              </li>
            </div>
          </details>
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"escalate_alerts_role_id"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"int64"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int64","default":2979,"description":"The role ID for escalated alerts. e.g: **2979**."}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"escalate_cases_role_id"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"int64"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int64","default":2979,"description":"The role ID for escalated cases. e.g: **2979**."}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"deleted_role_id"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"3300.","description":"The role ID that is to be removed or marked as as deleted. e.g: **3300**."}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem>
      </ul>
    </details>
  </TabItem>
</MimeTabs><div>
